org.colomoto.mddlib.logicalfunction

Interface FunctionNode

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBinaryOperator, AbstractOperand, AbstractOperator, AbstractUnaryOperator

    public interface FunctionNode
    Common interface for all nodes in the trees representing logical functions.
    Author:
    Fabrice Lopez: initial implementation, Aurelien Naldi: adaptation

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getMDD(MDDManager ddmanager)
      Construct a MDD corresponding to this logical function.
      int getMDD(MDDManager ddmanager, boolean reversed)
      Construct a MDD corresponding to this logical function.
      boolean isLeaf()
      Is it a leaf? Only used to help some toString methods.
      String toString(boolean par) 

    • Method Detail

      • toString

        String toString(boolean par)
        Parameters:
        par - if true, add surrounding parenthesis.
        Returns:
        a string representation of this logical function.

      • isLeaf

        boolean isLeaf()
        Is it a leaf? Only used to help some toString methods.
        Returns:
        true if this node is a leaf

      • getMDD

        int getMDD(MDDManager ddmanager)
        Construct a MDD corresponding to this logical function.
        Parameters:
        ddmanager - the MDDManager in which the MDD will be stored.
        Returns:
        the index of the corresponding MDD root.

      • getMDD

        int getMDD(MDDManager ddmanager,
         boolean reversed)
        Construct a MDD corresponding to this logical function.
        Parameters:
        ddmanager - the MDDManager in which the MDD will be stored.
        reversed -
        Returns:
        the index of the corresponding MDD root.
